oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Technology Transfer Symposium: Design of Strategic Anthelmintic Control Programs in Cattle Using a Mathematical Model: Paraban
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Smith, G.
Jacobsen, J. A.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: parasite control programs
cost-effective
anthelminitics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The design of cost-effective practical parasite control programs is fundamental to achieving optimum productivity from grazing cattle. Strategic treatment regimens such as the 3, 8 and 13 program utilizing ivermectin or the 3 and 6 recommendation for conventional anthelminitics have been developed from systematic field trials.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1994; 141
